tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Satellites (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  location GEOGRAPHY,
  launch_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DistanceCalculations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite1_id UUID REFERENCES Satellites(id),
  satellite2_id UUID REFERENCES Satellites(id),
  distance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE distances (
    id INT,
    satellite_id INT,
    distance_km FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(id)
);

CREATE TABLE calculations (
    id INT,
    distance_id INT,
    calculation_result FLOAT,
    calculation_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (distance_id) REFERENCES distances(id)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis (
    id INT,
    calculation_id INT,
    analysis_results JSON,
    analysis_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (calculation_id) REFERENCES calculations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_measurements (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT,
  measurement_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  measurement_value DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_satellite_id FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(satellite_id)
);

CREATE TABLE distances (
  distance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  from_satellite_id INT,
  to_satellite_id INT,
  distance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_from_satellite_id FOREIGN KEY (from_satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(satellite_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_to_satellite_id FOREIGN KEY (to_satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(satellite_id)
);

CREATE TABLE calculations (
  calculation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  from_satellite_id INT,
  to_satellite_id INT,
  calculated_distance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  calculation_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_from_satellite_id FOREIGN KEY (from_satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(satellite_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_to_satellite_id FOREIGN KEY (to_satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(satellite_id)
);
